name: Blobs (angrihorse)
description:
'Esc' to quit, 'Space' to freeze the game.

  1. You control a pack of pink blobs by holding the right mouse button.
  2. If other blobs are close enough to pink blobs, they have a chance of turning pink.
  3. Each pink blob lives for 5 seconds.
  4. Your goal is to turn most blobs pink before your pack goes extinct.
  5. If you turn pink more than 80% of the blobs, you will unlock a secret mechanic.

If you're struggling, try to notice how each type behaves. For example, teals are attracted to other teals, but are repelled by pinks.  You can use that information to form one large pack of teals like a shepherd driving his sheep. Then lead this pack into a corner and strike them all at once.  (Link to gif)
